home.title: GOTCAR - Guardians Of The Car | AI-Powered Mobility Ecosystem | Zero Accidents
home.description: GOTCAR transforms real-time driving data into secure, private, and valuable digital assets. Powered by AI Mobility Agent, building a safer, smarter, and decentralized mobility ecosystem. Join the Guardians and earn rewards through G2E (Guardians-to-Earn).
